name: 瓦妮莎·洛泰罗
name_full: 瓦妮莎·洛泰罗 Vanessa Lotero
birth_place: Miami, Florida, United States of America
introduction: Overview (1)Height	5' 8" (1.73 m)Mini Bio (1)Born in Miami, Florida, United States of America but grew up in Colombia. Has a degree in business and 5 years of experience acting in commercials, movies, television and has modeled.She was a finalist in Nuestra Belleza Latina 2009 the same year a Cuban Greidys Gil was chosen winner. Her acting debut was in the show "Mas Sabe El Diablo" from Telemundo. Now she is on the show "Pecadora".
